topic.title: Torrentz.eu Torrent Meta-search
topic.body: It was the best meta-search engine. I know it, you know it, everyone knows it. Now it's gone. I have tried this clone https://torrentz.unblockit.ltd but it fails to show seeds/leeches. So does Torrentz still exist anywhere? On the Tor network perhaps? Or is there another torrent meta-search engine you can recommend?

topic.title: I bought Cheap Flavorless Cheese. What now?
topic.body:
I bought a bulk 2 pounds Cheap Flavorless Cheese, and I've tried incorporating it into my normal dishes and recipes, but it's just a flavorless blob of fat and protein. It actually makes my omlet less delicious.

I'm never buying it again, but how can I avoid throwing all this cheese in the trash? Do you have some recipe I can make with this thing?

Edit:
Maybe there is some recipe that calls for bland cheese, or maybe I can spike the flavor somehow...

topic.title: Hurry To Get Your Vaccination Good Little Boys And Girls (And Gender Non-Binaries)
topic.body:
Those under age 50 have survival rate of 9,999 in 10,000 according to CDC data (and that's with their pumped up car crash fatality data). Basically, if you're not morbidly obese and don't have asthma, then the act of getting the vaccine is actually a greater risk of danger. A vaccine is considered "Acceptable" if 1 in 10,000 Healthy People suffer long term side effects. Yes, if you're a non-obese, non-asthmatic, healthy person, then you may suffer vaccine side effects. Personally, I'd rather take my chances with the virus.

Source:
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/planning-scenarios.html

topic.title: Encrochat 60,000 Member Encrypted Chat Network Infiltrated By EU Police
topic.body:
> "As the second major encrypted phone network to be shut down by police in Europe, Sky ECC's seeming downfall has parallels with the Encrochat story, where French and Dutch police man-in-the-middle'd the encrypted phone network on suspicion it was being used mainly by organised criminals"

> "French police infiltrated the EncroChat encrypted phone network in April 2020, in an operation that has led to hundreds of arrests in the UK and Europe"

> "EncroChat encrypt their messages with the Signal Protocol. This is a commonly used encryption protocol that is freely available"

It appears they may have inserted a corrupt encryption library into a package update. Such a simple method of attack is extremely effective because all messages pass through a Central server. Compare this to P2P networks which are far more resilient- P2P messages can go directly from the sender to the receiver, with no Central point of failure, no middle man

If you're interested in more secure communications, Popular P2P messaging networks are: Session, Briar, Tox, and Jami.

Software Links:
https://getsession.org (muli-platform)
https://briarproject.org (Android only)
https://tox.chat (muli-platform)
https://jami.net

.

News Sources:
https://www.theregister.com/2021/03/10/sky_ecc_encrypted_phones_belgium_police_raids/
https://www.computerweekly.com/news/252501921/Secrecy-around-EncroChat-cryptophone-hack-breaches-French-constitution-court-hears
https://www.vice.com/en/article/pkdjab/encrochat-signal-protocol-encryption

1612007867_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Sophistry. This post is so wrong as to be embarrassing. Didn't even get first premises correct.

1) A Fact is statement which can be verified True or False. (A fact can even be false, and it is still a fact) https://www.rd.com/list/false-facts-everyone-believes

Example Fact: "The cavalry is coming" It is possible to observe and verify whether or not the cavalry actually is coming. It is True or False.

2) An Opinion is a statement that cannot be verified as True or False.

Example Opinion: "We just need Faith to win" It is impossible to verify that Faith actually makes any difference to win. Another person may believe it is Determination that is needed to win. There is no way to verify, which makes this statement an Opinion.

Go back to Philosophy 101. Study some Epistemology, and logical fallacies. Then come back in a couple months and try again.
